But I am get=

present."
I m using foll=
owing code lines to set page & form elemnts method:

seUrl("http://localhost:8080/test");

mentPresent("login");

any help would be highly appreciated.

I m not havin=
g any good stuff on this topic so I can't do any R&D 
for the code...
